name: ELFLOON
description:

My solo entry for the Winter Jam!

"The end is near"

It's right there! You just need to find the key Santa has dropped by exploring the caves! Watch out for squishy bugs and pointy spikes! Collect gems on your way for score!

Arrow keys to move (Left, Right, Down)

"R" key to restart at any time.
